text:
Yeah noticed the same, not even with `!important`. we first thought that we’d instruct content producers to use the _Link (no style)_ style for CTAs which is easy to then style with our own CSS.

But, because people don’t remember to choose that we ended up creating a custom CTA module to which a HubSpot CTA is linked, and it strips the link and other needed things from HubSpot CTA and creates our own looking one regardless of the _Button style_ selected in CTA creation.
